list_definition.definition: the surface in a room etc on which one stands or walks

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The baby was crawling about n the floor.

list_definition.definition: all the rooms on the same level in a building

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: My office is on the third floor.

list_definition.definition: to make or cover a floor

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We’ve floored the kitchen with plastic tiles.
He floored him with a powerful blow.
